sentences.sContent: Any of numerous small fishes of the family Cyprinodontidae, including the guppy and mosquito fish, inhabiting chiefly fresh and brackish waters in warm regions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any of numerous small fishes of the family Cyprinodontidae, including the guppy and mosquito fish, inhabiting chiefly fresh and brackish waters in warm regions.
sentences.sCn: 鳉鱼属于鳉科的许多种小型鱼，包括虹鳉和蚊鱼，主要栖居在温暖地带的淡水和咸水中。

sentences.sContent: Israel extracts about 65% of the upper Jordan , leaving the occupied West Bank dependent on a brackish trickle and a mountain aquifer , access to which Israel also controls .
sentences.sContent_eng: Israel extracts about 65% of the upper Jordan , leaving the occupied West Bank dependent on a brackish trickle and a mountain aquifer , access to which Israel also controls .
sentences.sCn: 以色列提取出约旦河上游约65%的水源，使供水中的约旦河西岸依赖于一条咸水细流和山脉地下蓄水层，其入口仍为以色列控制。

synos.tran: 含盐的；令人不快的；难吃的

phrases.pCn: 苦咸水（碱性水）；微咸水；半咸水；淡盐水（盐分界于河海水之间）

remMethod.val: brack(看作black) + ish(看作fish) → 黑色的咸鱼 → 微咸的

trans.tranOther: brackish water is not pure because it is slightly salty
